q1.question: Do you sell to end-users?
q1.answer: No. We are a B2B manufacturer protecting our distributors. We do not sell single units to the public.

q2.question: Can I mix different brands?
q2.answer: Absolutely. You can mix 50pcs of Nice compatible + 50pcs of Came compatible to meet the MOQ.

q3.question: Do receivers come with remotes?
q3.answer: You can purchase receivers separately, or as a kit with 2 remotes at a special bundle price.

q4.question: What is your typical lead time for bulk orders?
q4.answer: Standard orders: 3-5 business days. Express orders: 1-2 business days. All orders shipped via DHL/FedEx.

q5.question: Do you offer technical support?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive technical support, programming guides, and video tutorials for all our products.

about.title: About GateRemoteSource
about.description: Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen as a PCBA workshop, later relocated to Dongguan (2021) with a 4,000 m2 facility - now a full OEM/ODM manufacturer for the global access control market.
about.mission: Our mission is to empower locksmiths and installers with high-quality, high-margin aftermarket solutions that just work.
about.timeline_2015_description: Founded in 2015 in Shenzhen, China, starting as a PCBA assembly workshop.
about.timeline_2023_description: Exporting to 40+ countries, 100% focused on B2B aftermarket solutions.
about.timeline_2018_description: Achieved ISO certification to strengthen our quality management system.
about.timeline_2020_description: Launched our first Universal Rolling Code remote series.
about.timeline_2021_relocation_description: Relocated our factory from Shenzhen to Dongguan and expanded the workshop to 4,000 m2.
about.timeline_2021_hightech_description: Awarded the China National High-Tech Enterprise certificate.
